---
title: Overnight Protein Oats
description: Overnight protein oats
categories: [Protein, Snack]
Cook Time: 12 hours
---

* 2 scoops protein powder
* 1/2 cup greek yogurt
* 1 banana
* 1/3 cup berries
* 1/2 tbsp flaxseed
* 1/3 tbsp chia seed
* 1 tbsp honey
* Add water for desired consistency

Blend until smooth.
